heading: HB03333
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE MARCELO GREEN HIGH SCHOOL (PARAÑAQUE NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL ANNEX) IN BARANGAY MARCELO GREEN,CITY OF PARAÑAQUE, FROM THE PARAÑAQUE NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS MARCELO GREEN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
